attributes.action: Scrap or lower the fee of the naturalisation for Europeans living in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Looking at the other countries citizenship is way less expensive - within affordable couple of hundred pounds. People left homes and families behind to start a new life in the UK. Show the appreciation for those people.
attributes.background: Many people like me have lived in this country for  years, contributing to the economy, starting families, having children at school, businesses, houses etc. Many of us want to stay in the UK but cant afford high fees to become British citizens. Scrap the fee or drop it down to affordable level
